name: Think Fast - Time Based Memory Game
name_original: Think Fast - Time Based Memory Game
description:
Can you think really fast? Test your recognition skills and enhance your visual memory while having fun with Think Fast!

[How to play]
● Tap a card to see which image appears when it turns.
● Try to find where is the other card with the same picture and tap it.
● When you choose a wrong card, it is a good idea trying to memorize its position.
● Try to get 3 medals: bronze, silver (hard) and gold (very hard).
● Compete with friends for the higher score!

[Get the latest news]
